text.0: Elizabeth Rourke, M.D., discusses practicing internal medicine over the Internet during the #COVID19 pandemic.
text.1: This Graphic Perspective explores the triumphs and tribulations of caring for patients remotely in the #COVID19 era. Suddenly forced to use technology that may not be ready for prime time, a primary care physician and her patients discover its risks and benefits. #SARSCoV2
text.2: All NEJM articles on the Race and Medicine topic page are freely available.
text.3: Across the U.S., health status and outcomes, access to care vary by race and ethnic group. This Interactive Perspective uses data aggregated by the Health Opportunity and Equity Initiative, allowing readers to view and compare data by state and for six racial and ethnic groups.
